channel.title: Priest change suggestions
channel.description:
I think some of the following things would make priest more interesting:
1) Revived players take the priest's body Makes it more interesting, and priest a little better as prince stays anonymous. Not only that, but if priest still has temp death immunity, so will revived player.
2) can speak with revived player from beyond grave make them a little more fun alternatively, can do a seance like medium in ToS

item.title: Priest change suggestions
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
I feel like the priest should be able to talk to the revived when dead for as long as they want, but they can’t see dead chat for as long as they are talking

Read full topic

item.title: Priest change suggestions
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
1 is actually probably a great idea, although I’m not sold on keeping the immunity just yet

Read full topic

item.title: Priest change suggestions
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
I think some of the following things would make priest more interesting:

  1. Revived players take the priest’s body
    Makes it more interesting, and priest a little better as prince stays anonymous. Not only that, but if priest still has temp death immunity, so will revived player.

  2. can speak with revived player from beyond grave
    make them a little more fun
    alternatively, can do a seance like medium in ToS

Read full topic
